name: PumpkinSayings
0:
”Alexa, open pumpkin sayings”
”Alexa, ask pumpkin sayings for a saying”
”Alexa, ask pumpkin sayings to tell me a saying”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: pumpkin sayings
des: Pumpkins? More like PumpKings! Get PUMPed up for this Halloween, as the wise old pumpkins lend their knowledge to you! In this skill, you will learn all you can about how to survive in this scary world. Just say to Alexa, "Ask Pumpkin Sayings to give me a saying"!
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
